title: Little Big Adventure - Lba 1 & 2 - Full versions
description:
Little Big Adventure 1 & 2
Full versions, no CD needed, lots of savegames included, enjoy !


NOTES
-------------------------------------
To change the game language: edit the "Languaje" sections as needed in the files lba.cfg for LBA 1 and lba2.cfg for LBA 2.

To run games:
LBA 1: run lbawin.exe
LBA 2: run twinsen.exe
-------------------------------------


Yours,
Botellero
